title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 390.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 390.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The definitions contained in article 79 of the Insurance Law (article 79) shall apply to this Part. (b) The definitions contained in section
107
of the Insurance Law shall also apply to article 79 and this Part. (c) As used in article 79 of the Insurance Law and this Part, qualified United States financial institution shall mean a bank chartered in New York or a bank that is a member of the Federal Reserve System. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
390.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
